Member Function Documentation

URef< GrQuery > GrQueryMgr::GetQuery ( GrQuery::EQUERYTYPE  type  ) 

gets or creates an unused query.

public methods

get a reference to the array we're pulling from.

check for a free query.

if the current query is unused, then return it.

if we got here, then there are no free queries available. Create a new one, add it to the list of queries.

return the new query.
